document.full_text: the drummer with rock band ac/dc has had his cannabis conviction quashed by a court in his adopted homeland of new zealand on the grounds that it would have interfered with his globe-trotting exploits.
document.title: ac/dc drummer's drug conviction overturned in nz
lines_and_colors: the drummer with rock band ac/dc has had his cannabis conviction quashed by a court in his adopted homeland of new zealand on the grounds that it would have interfered with his globe-trotting exploits.
